DOC.brief_summary: The study aims to evaluate if a GERD treatment programme, in accordance with current regional recommendations, in a company health care setting, has an impact on health related quality of life (HRQoL), symptoms, and productivity in GERD patients.
DOC.brief_title: Structured Treatment of Gastroesophageal Reflux in a Company Health Care Setting, -Effect on Quality of Life, Symptoms and Productivity
DOC.criteria: Female and/or male aged > 18 years Diagnosis of GERD confirmed Prescription of GERD treatment or already receiving GERD treatment Any symptom suggesting a need for further investigation Previous participation in the present study Current participation in a clinical study or participation in a clinical study during the last 30 days
